Literature.Title: Converting Teixobactin into a Cationic Antimicrobial Peptide (AMP).
Literature.Author: Abdel Monaim SAH, Ramchuran EJ, El-Faham A, Albericio F, de la Torre BG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=128µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=512µg/ml)
